ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: making from it both sexes, male and female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And assigned it sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then He made of him a pair, male and female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Was he not turned into a clot of blood? God then formed him and gave him proper shape. From the human being, God made males and females in pairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So created from him a pair, the male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And made of him two sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then He made of him two kinds, the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He made of him two kinds, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And made of him a pair, the male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: fashioning out of him the two sexes, the male and the female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And made of him the two sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and made of him the two sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And of him He made two sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And made him in two sexes, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and made from him two kinds, male and female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And made of him the two sexes, the male and the female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:39] and made of it, of the drop of semen that became a blood-clot, then an embryo, a [small] mass of flesh, the two sexes, the two kinds, the male and the female, at times coming together and at times each being on their own.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And made of him) after that (a pair, the male and female) Abu Jahl had a son called 'Ikrimah Ibn Abi Jahl and a daughter called Juwayrah Bint Abi Jahl.
